*   **Samsung Odyssey Neo G7:** This 43" 4K gaming monitor is on sale for $694 (list price $999.99) [extremetech](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH_wGlORrE1L3VfjrKi1qE-9ZqyFCOO_9Hu7bYA8iXHtCJOJJb6oO9B9BkhleFiqSzJ4DWDwtgFqWkFjeyVtx3WGEy1wkwzOMjShnaNPA2ga0X3UsBVVTp2VT2bs9VOk4WNHrE7ODK-CEfgFJPYdtM0xGaQIYGO). An open box version is available for $449.99 [techbargains](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF2nUwp5L-btRxqSq46nmpUypW7gH_alReDB_zf9cHsUEKv3tsCfun4aogG1Jc6WSstrbiIHOq-bvHRpJy7-kKkx7mXOGM_LNgLGROCdB_hwuZIMrgYh8bBrFNesy3fOVeUb5iRHs0UTR_WDg==).
*   **MSI 32" 4K Gaming Monitor:** You can find this for $349.99 (list price $439.99) [extremetech](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH_wGlORrE1L3VfjrKi1qE-9ZqyFCOO_9Hu7bYA8iXHtCJOJJb6oO9B9BkhleFiqSzJ4DWDwtgFqWkFjeyVtx3WGEy1wkwzOMjShnaNPA2ga0X3UsBVVTp2VT2bs9VOk4WNHrE7ODK-CEfgFJPYdtM0xGaQIYGO).
*   **LG UltraGear 32" 4K Gaming Monitor:** This monitor is priced at $569.99 (list price $699.99) [extremetech](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH_wGlORrE1L3VfjrKi1qE-9ZqyFCOO_9Hu7bYA8iXHtCJOJJb6oO9B9BkhleFiqSzJ4DWDwtgFqWkFjeyVtx3WGEy1wkwzOMjShnaNPA2ga0X3UsBVVTp2VT2bs9VOk4WNHrE7ODK-CEfgFJPYdtM0xGaQIYGO).
*   **Samsung M7 (M70F) 43" 4K Smart Monitor:** It's available for $499.99 and comes with a $100 Samsung credit [techbargains](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF2nUwp5L-btRxqSq46nmpUypW7gH_alReDB_zf9cHsUEKv3tsCfun4aogG1Jc6WSstrbiIHOq-bvHRpJy7-kKkx7mXOGM_LNgLGROCdB_hwuZIMrgYh8bBrFNesy3fOVeUb5iRHs0UTR_WDg==).
*   **Alienware AW3225QF:** The 32" Alienware AW3225QF 4K QD-OLED gaming monitor is on sale for $849.99 with free shipping [ign](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEwipS2TNw3zbkpd-5j5k72zvRYHjSXTLvfJN50ax2Xwpy59WL7oZKEiVDAQ6P1Y4QunFjv7JKSuNNbQEFHQYM8dQFHEnS5OeRpW2l_3JfFOIlRvAzNoQtU0xiGH7ewMXrPl06AwZx-dL-qPV5t7IAeo3D234oB_1RRXk2e4rSyJNaYELwtknldVcfD2nhAGpGQSWi0ABXy9ZrHynpaSuWR6mM3o2IAJC176Y5CDCcD_cen). QD-OLED technology offers brighter panels with excellent contrast and black levels [ign](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEwipS2TNw3zbkpd-5j5k72zvRYHjSXTLvfJN50ax2Xwpy59WL7oZKEiVDAQ6P1Y4QunFjv7JKSuNNbQEFHQYM8dQFHEnS5OeRpW2l_3JfFOIlRvAzNoQtU0xiGH7ewMXrPl06AwZx-dL-qPV5t7IAeo3D234oB_1RRXk2e4rSyJNaYELwtknldVcfD2nhAGpGQSWi0ABXy9ZrHynpaSuWR6mM3o2IAJC176Y5CDCcD_cen).
*   **Samsung Odyssey OLED G8:** A 32" 4K 240Hz 0.03ms monitor is on sale for $856.58 (save $443.41) [pcmag](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQE1l-pPjLu-VjUb45qxmrCaGAs8XMdj3LukNRhnjXpmd-2GnW5ZQj4ii5vM6PP4IYuem10knYE7rOa1cyUU51nTTzPdEKiTE_kWtL_3UVpO-ZIIgIf8kGbwEkjnqKzW44ASsPMoftv5Ot2Tfg==) [pcmag](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEl4RYm0FLkx5EyFItJQpaTk9Ct5aPeue6L7UcSVZ3EU15qEX2XMqEeoNqkn3hUJ0dvRkVdSZBxM-OIyysh-qBXTTO6XnD_B97L0VdLk7gx2ts7RxFcS6ngnWXvNdIGGzcbySiGOt1HWyikW7ViCAE=].
*   **Dell Pro Plus P2725QE:** A 27" 4K IPS monitor with USB-C Hub is on sale for $489.99 (save $30) [pcmag](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQE1l-pPjLu-VjUb45qxmrCaGAs8XMdj3LukNRhnjXpmd-2GnW5ZQj4ii5vM6PP4IYuem10knYE7rOa1cyUU51nTTzPdEKiTE_kWtL_3UVpO-ZIIgIf8kGbwEkjnqKzW44ASsPMoftv5Ot2Tfg==) [pcmag](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEl4RYm0FLkx5EyFItJQpaTk9Ct5aPeue6L7UcSVZ3EU15qEX2XMqEeoNqkn3hUJ0dvRkVdSZBxM-OIyysh-qBXTTO6XnD_B97L0VdLk7gx2ts7RxFcS6ngnWXvNdIGGzcbySiGOt1HWyikW7ViCAE=).
*   **Samsung ViewFinity S7:** A 32" 4K HDR10 monitor is on sale for $249.99 (save $150) [pcmag](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQE1l-pPjLu-VjUb45qxmrCaGAs8XMdj3LukNRhnjXpmd-2GnW5ZQj4ii5vM6PP4IYuem10knYE7rOa1cyUU51nTTzPdEKiTE_kWtL_3UVpO-ZIIgIf8kGbwEkjnqKzW44ASsPMoftv5Ot2Tfg==) [pcmag](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEl4RYm0FLkx5EyFItJQpaTk9Ct5aPeue6L7UcSVZ3EU15qEX2XMqEeoNqkn3hUJ0dvRkVdSZBxM-OIyysh-qBXTTO6XnD_B97L0VdLk7gx2ts7RxFcS6ngnWXvNdIGGzcbySiGOt1HWyikW7ViCAE=).

When choosing a 4K monitor, especially for gaming, consider fast refresh rates, low input lag, and sharp resolution [extremetech](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH_wGlORrE1L3VfjrKi1qE-9ZqyFCOO_9Hu7bYA8iXHtCJOJJb6oO9B9BkhleFiqSzJ4DWDwtgFqWkFjeyVtx3WGEy1wkwzOMjShnaNPA2ga0X3UsBVVTp2VT2bs9VOk4WNHrE7ODK-CEfgFJPYdtM0xGaQIYGO]. A refresh rate of 144Hz or higher is recommended for smooth gaming [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHN0JEuGWRZon2Nb6xT-vKGcxlgCDnrk65jzeA2GX-N4JaCbDeBfWa88WrUqsroJsq8d5RcLi4yFCUQdZCy8WJ5ITreLsbuTLGTYn8Byxbjvkg5mzuJ6nDCSYaoF5GqGx47XSOfgSy2wI2GOApnmwOlvd18Xuja_w==), and a response time of 1ms or less is ideal [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHN0JEuGWRZon2Nb6xT-vKGcxlgCDnrk65jzeA2GX-N4JaCbDeBfWa88WrUqsroJsq8d5RcLi4yFCUQdZCy8WJ5ITreLsbuTLGTYn8Byxbjvkg5mzuJ6nDCSYaoF5GqGx47XSOfgSy2wI2GOApnmwOlvd18Xuja_w==]. Adaptive sync technologies like Nvidia G-Sync or AMD FreeSync are essential for eliminating stuttering [newegg](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG1LRQAETXmrhNiZWToPC2NAD79li8Y5kD1eSch_i-X9ayoIjVvkfiUg3R16r9kGzB0_kZZcjlwVsZi4tAVujsHU8g83XJjB1Za9L98FIz109h6KcqD6Ikjuq-OQQ5FfD67vC_oSEgEGMiamWYgA-lU_ocs3p97cKNx5kw=0) [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHN0JEuGWRZon2Nb6xT-vKGcxlgCDnrk65jzeA2GX-N4JaCbDeBfWa88WrUqsroJsq8d5RcLi4yFCUQdZCy8WJ5ITreLsbuTLGTYn8Byxbjvkg5mzuJ6nDCSYaoF5GqGx47XSOfgSy2wI2GOApnmwOlvd18Xuja_w==]. Brands like LG, ASUS, Samsung, Dell, and BenQ are known for reliable monitors [cybernews](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHece4YWdNvxslT-n2JtuZ3qFoAzsggH9e2Rk64QXK1GURFPtXUjC_FdzyPS41XVjutl7gJO2v_AF8wb0dhbDACfFOkmfqlwWgZOBvlDRjww7lEwU-UCfx0irhRvDNbcsdu_gBFMN-iUTUlrE5PWno=].

For professional use, a 60Hz refresh rate is generally sufficient [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFAidEJskHI0U56AAAnoORTRLw_qhNKJp3aCppMmEyk4k2RM3hJ6KmTSaZRLRj7_9_7GAA3nc8FlBKfn7c14OA8xYbdpdc4k7HSBGnwFxudhN9mFuWcYq76VuoXpzI-xsDRU_1E3avu8PFoQ7oiDzPKdqhuL6s=) [japannext](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFbDowEac2veDEOBBP6VrIbuTwy1jzZG1bBW3JvUyjWuPn5U-5VbJcW2Qjl6lRq_JwsKC3uGQuA-Dneb8uH7rJNHn4iGMJSmIc_Mm1IuaI_4WuAUM0v9nwuEh5nuxD7p6mzBhsfo7sqhNWjmpbf3nZONzFGSr02cnpnVy7mMBCdBJ7c-2lpkg==], but video editing benefits from higher refresh rates [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFAidEJskHI0U56AAAnoORTRLw_qhNKJp3aCppMmEyk4k2RM3hJ6KmTSaZRLRj7_9_7GAA3nc8FlBKfn7c14OA8xYbdpdc4k7HSBGnwFxudhN9mFuWcYq76VuoXpzI-xsDRU_1E3avu8PFoQ7oiDzPKdqhuL6s=]. IPS panels offer excellent color accuracy [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHN0JEuGWRZon2Nb6xT-vKGcxlgCDnrk65jzeA2GX-N4JaCbDeBfWa88WrUqsroJsq8d5RcLi4yFCUQdZCy8WJ5ITreLsbuTLGTYn8Byxbjvkg5mzuJ6nDCSYaoF5GqGx47XSOfgSy2wI2GOApnmwOlvd18Xuja_w==) [hp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEFQ7II5u794i_HRnMkIOg1o9u4oBxm3iDpbITMtIAcY2IB7NCldoZ7T1hRPPOMM3NZHFA4WssD_sWWyCAZtk5gGuThT6HWKeCBf9fV2dx4TtOsJYD37vjLK4yM-kzsMrKjSgiMTIXLnecg79gPQo4nY-Ec_uSyyQ==]. Ensure the monitor has the necessary ports, such as HDMI 2.1 and DisplayPort [japannext](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFbDowEac2veDEOBBP6VrIbuTwy1jzZG1bBW3JvUyjWuPn5U-5VbJcW2Qjl6lRq_JwsKC3uGQuA-Dneb8uH7rJNHn4iGMJSmIc_Mm1IuaI_4WuAUM0v9nwuEh5nuxD7p6mzBhsfo7sqhNWjmpbf3nZONzFGSr02cnpnVy7mMBCdBJ7c-2lpkg==) [hp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEFQ7II5u794i_HRnMkIOg1o9u4oBxm3iDpbITMtIAcY2IB7NCldoZ7T1hRPPOMM3NZHFA4WssD_sWWyCAZtk5gGuThT6HWKeCBf9fV2dx4TtOsJYD37vjLK4yM-kzsMrKjSgiMTIXLnecg79gPQo4nY-Ec_uSyyQ==), with HDMI 2.1 recommended for high refresh rate 4K gaming [hp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG1LRQAETXmrhNiZWToPC2NAD79li8Y5kD1eSch_i-X9ayoIjVvkfiUg3R16r9kGzB0_kZZcjlwVsZi4tAVujsHU8g83XJjB1Za9L98FIz109h6KcqD6Ikjuq-OQQ5FfD67vC_oSEgEGMiamWYgA-lU_ocs3p97cKNx5kw=2].

search_query: What are the typical response times and refresh rates for 4K monitors in the listed deals, and how do these specifications affect gaming or professional use?
web_research_result:
Okay, I will conduct Google Searches to find the best 4k monitor deals for July 2025 and synthesize the information into a verifiable text artifact.

Here's a summary of the best 4K monitor deals in July 2025, based on the search results:

**General Deals & Sales:**

*   Several retailers are offering monitor deals, including those on 4K monitors [tomshardware](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-0). Keep an eye on Amazon, Newegg, Dell, Samsung, and LG for potential savings [tomshardware](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-0).
*   Alienware's Black Friday in July sale is underway, offering deals on gaming PCs, laptops, and monitors [ign](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1). This sale is considered one of the best from Dell for the first half of 2025 [ign](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1).
*   Prime Day is also a good opportunity to find monitor deals [cybernews](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2).

**Specific 4K Monitor Deals:**

*   **Samsung Odyssey Neo G7:** A 43" 4K gaming monitor is listed for $694 (list price $999.99) [extremetech](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3). An open box version is available for $449.99 [techbargains](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4).
*   **MSI 32" 4K Gaming Monitor:** Available for $349.99 (list price $439.99) [extremetech](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3).
*   **LG UltraGear 32" 4K Gaming Monitor:** Priced at $569.99 (list price $699.99) [extremetech](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3).
*   **Samsung M7 (M70F) 43" 4K Smart Monitor:** Available for $499.99 and comes with a $100 Samsung credit [techbargains](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4).
*   **Alienware AW3225QF:** The 32" Alienware AW3225QF 4K QD-OLED gaming monitor is on sale for $849.99 with free shipping [ign](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1).
*   **Samsung Odyssey OLED G8:** A 32" 4K 240Hz 0.03ms monitor is on sale for $856.58 (save $443.41) [pcmag](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5) [pcmag](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-6).

**Other notable monitors:**

*   **Dell Pro Plus P2725QE:** A 27" 4K IPS monitor with USB-C Hub is on sale for $489.99 (save $30) [pcmag](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5) [pcmag](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-6).
*   **Samsung ViewFinity S7:** A 32" 4K HDR10 monitor is on sale for $249.99 (save $150) [pcmag](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5) [pcmag](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-6).

**Things to Consider:**

*   When looking for gaming monitors, consider features like fast refresh rates, low input lag, and sharp resolution [extremetech](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3).
*   Brands like LG, ASUS, Samsung, Dell, and BenQ are known for reliable monitors [cybernews](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2).
*   QD-OLED technology offers brighter panels with excellent contrast and black levels [ign](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1).
Typical response times and refresh rates for 4K monitors, and their effects on gaming and professional use, are detailed below:

**Response Times:**

*   **Gaming:** For fast-paced gaming, a response time of 1ms or less is ideal to prevent ghosting and maintain clarity during intense action [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). Some 4K gaming monitors have response times of 3-4ms, which is acceptable for other types of games [coolblue](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1).
*   **Professional Use:** A response time of less than 5ms is generally recommended for 4K monitors [japannext](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2).
*   **Technology:** OLED panels generally have the fastest response times [xp-pen](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3). Some monitors now boast response times as low as 0.03ms [tomshardware](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4) [currys](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5) [cclonline](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-6).

**Refresh Rates:**

*   **Gaming:** A refresh rate of 144Hz or higher is recommended for smooth motion in gaming, reducing screen tearing and input lag [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). Some high-end models support up to 240Hz at 4K resolution [rtings](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7) [tomshardware](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).
*   **Professional Use:** A refresh rate of 60Hz is typically sufficient for everyday use such as web browsing, document editing, and general productivity [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-8) [japannext](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2). However, video editing benefits from higher refresh rates [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-8).
*   **Technology:** High refresh rates at 4K resolution require a powerful graphics card [hp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-9) [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). Adaptive sync technologies like Nvidia G-Sync or AMD FreeSync are essential for eliminating stuttering [newegg](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-10) [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).

**How Specifications Affect Use:**

*   **Gaming:** Higher refresh rates and lower response times are crucial for competitive gaming, providing smoother motion and reducing input lag [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0) [computercity](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-11). Adaptive Sync technology is also essential for eliminating screen tearing and stuttering [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   **Professional Use:** 4K monitors enhance workflow and output quality for content creators, photographers, and video editors [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-8) [hp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-9). The increased pixel density improves text clarity and reduces eye strain during long work sessions [hp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-9). Wide color gamuts like Adobe RGB or DCI-P3 are important for color-critical tasks [hp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-9).

**Specific Examples of 4K Monitors:**

*   **GIGABYTE GS27U:** 27-inch, 160 Hz refresh rate, 1 ms response time [currys](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5).
*   **MSI MAG 274UPF E2:** 27-inch, 160 Hz refresh rate, 1 ms response time [currys](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5).
*   **MSI MPG 322URX:** 32-inch, 240 Hz refresh rate, 0.03 ms response time [currys](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5).
*   **ASUS ROG Swift PG27UCDM:** 27-inch, 240 Hz refresh rate, 0.03 ms response time [tomshardware](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).
*   **HP Omen 32 OLED:** 32-inch, 240 Hz refresh rate [tomshardware](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).

**Additional Considerations:**

*   **Panel Type:** IPS panels offer excellent color accuracy and wide viewing angles, while TN panels provide faster response times [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0) [hp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-9). VA panels offer better contrast ratios and deeper blacks [lenovo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   **Connectivity:** Ensure the monitor has the necessary ports, such as HDMI 2.1 and DisplayPort [japannext](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2) [hp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-9). HDMI 2.1 is recommended for high refresh rate 4K gaming [hp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-12).
*   **Screen Size:** 27 to 32 inches is generally recommended for 4K gaming [coolblue](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1).
*   **Cables:** Use HDMI 2.1-certified cables to support 4K at 120Hz [vcom](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-13).
